longBusinessSummary: Sanden Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automotive equipment systems in Japan and internationally. The company offers compressor products for automotive air conditioning, such as electric, variable and fixed displacement type, and CO2 compressors; HVAC units; heat exchangers; electric coolant heaters; pipes for air conditioning; and heat pump systems. It also provides living and environment systems. The company was formerly known as Sanden Holdings Corporation and changed its name to Sanden Corporation in January 2022. The company was incorporated in 1943 and is headquartered in Isesaki, Japan. Sanden Corporation is a subsidiary of Hisense Japan Automotive Air-Conditioning Systems Corporation.
